channel.title: A couple questions
channel.description:
Ok, i got a few questions.
How do i add an alter? Theres not one on my server atm.
How do i change drops?
Peaple can eat manta ray on my server VERY fast.
How do i change what npc's say and how do i change the chat, it syas welcom to all-star scape and i need to change that.
How do i change when i go to quests it says all-star scape and i wanna change it to eaglescape.
Theres a screen that pops up when u get on. I need to remove that or change what it says.
I dont hold godswords right.
Thanks if you help me :)

item.title: A couple questions
item.dc:creator: @moparclient moparclient
item.description:
@moparclient wrote:

  1. seatch for globalobjects() or newobjects()
    add under it this:
makeGlobalObject(XXXX, YYYY, OBJID, 0, 10);

to get the coords type ::mypos if you don’t have just add this to your commands: if(command.startsWith("mypos") && playerRights > 0){ sendmessage("AbsX: "+absX+" AbsY: "+absY+""); }

  1. item2.java or item.java depends the server

  2. add a timer to the food

4.npchandler.java seatch for the message you wnna change

5.find on client.java “all-star” or on text.java texthandler.java depends the server

6.same as above

7.you can’t make it hold like rs you can only change to a similar one

Read full topic
